title: Semiramis Awakened
description: How can I choose between life and love?Truth is stranger than fiction. That's what I'd always been told. But I didn't realize how true that was until I found out that I was being hunted by the very mythological beings that I thought were just fantasy. Warlocks, gods, and angels were all just stories to me, until they are staring me in the face.Now I'm torn. Who do I trust? How do I do what's right. Secrets and hidden agendas might kill us all. I just found my sisters and now, I might lose them. How do I fight against lifetimes of hatred?I can only hope my magick is enough to keep humanity from the damnation that some have planned...
author: Maya Daniels
